name: Naafiri
subtitle: the Hound of a Hundred Bites
description: Across the sands of Shurima, a chorus of howls rings out. It is the call of the dune hounds, voracious predators who form packs and compete for the right to hunt in these barren lands. Among them, one pack stands above all, for they are driven not only... See More

abilities.name: We Are More
abilities.description: Naafiri spawns packmates that attack the targets of her attacks and abilities.

abilities.name: Darkin Daggers
abilities.description:
Naafiri hurls up to two daggers, each inflicting bleed, or each inflicting bonus damage if the target is already bleeding.

Packmates leap to attack champions hit by this skill.

abilities.name: Hounds' Pursuit
abilities.description: Naafiri and her packmates dash at an enemy, colliding with the first champion hit and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Eviscerate
abilities.description: Naafiri dashes and damages enemies in an area around her, recalling her packmates and fully healing them.
